conbody.p: (c)(1) The Desk Guide for Service Contract Price Adjustments contains DON guidance on processing price adjustments under FAR 52.222-43 and FAR 52.222-44 that result from:
(i) Changes in wage determinations issued under the Service Contract Labor Standards statute, or
(ii) Amendments changing the minimum wage required by the Fair Labor Standards Act.
